title: 5 Seconds of Summer’s Michael Clifford Announces Debut Solo Album ‘Sidequest’
caption: 🚀✨ Get ready for a musical adventure! @Michael5SOS is dropping his debut solo album 'Sidequest' - are you ready to join the journey? 🎶 #MichaelClifford #Sidequest
